title: Mother Goose rhymes: background for reading and expression
subject_group: Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Reading - Study and teaching

description: Brings to life, in "Mother Goose Land", a host of nursery favourites: Little Bo-Peep, London Bridge, Jack-Be-Nimble, The Old Woman who lived in a Shoe and others. Designed as a stimulus for junior grades, in reading and expression.
